backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the requirement to remove the contract address (CA) display from Step 2 of the HowToBuySection component, with high confidence and linked to REQ-25.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files, describing the purpose and key details of each component, style, and config file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, card, border, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app titled 'The Pointless Coin', mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes the full page layout by rendering Navigation, HeroSection, TickerBanner, AboutSection, TokenomicsSection, HowToBuySection, CommunitySection, and Footer in order.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Two-column section with a glowing coin image and humorous meme-coin copy explaining that $POINTLESS has no utility, no roadmap, and no BS, along with tag pills and an origin story subsection.
frontend/src/components/CommunitySection: Community section featuring a single X Community social card linking to the Pointless Army X community, plus a large CTA banner with a floating coin image and Buy/Join buttons.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with brand logo, quick navigation links, an X social icon linking to the X Communities page, a legal disclaimer, dynamic copyright year, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the landing page hero section with a floating coin image, animated star particles, headline, ticker symbol, tagline, and CTA buttons that smooth-scroll to target sections.
Displays a three-step guide (create Phantom wallet, swap SOL for $POINTLESS, hold) with icons, descriptions, and tips in a card grid layout.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with scroll-aware background, smooth-scroll nav links, a buy CTA button, and a collapsible mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/RoadmapSection.t: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/TickerBanner.tsx: Renders a horizontally scrolling marquee banner displaying repeated $POINTLESS-themed slogans with a gold styling.
frontend/src/components/TokenomicsSectio: Displays tokenomics stats (1B supply, 0% team allocation) in cards and shows the contract address with a copy-to-clipboard button.
frontend/src/components/TweetBanner.tsx: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login, logout, and identity persistence with status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for a dark/gold theme, and provides utility classes for gold glows, buttons, cards, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider (React Query) and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with OKLCH-based color tokens (gold, dark, sidebar), custom fonts (Bangers, Black Han Sans, Inter), gold box-shadow utilities, and keyframe animations for accordion, coin float, and glow effects.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file (version 21) describing the 'The Pointless Coin' meme coin website built on Solana, listing architectural notes, existing features (hero, nav, about, tokenomics, how-to-buy, roadmap, community sections), and known issues.
